overview: Freddie Collier, a troubled teenager is faced with the world for the first time. And he hates it.  Inside of the mind of Freddie Collier, his words, his message, his poetry and his story. Multiple sides to one story using his imagination and his fears. Freddie tries his hardest to encapsulate his heart, his words and his emotions with stories about mental health, love, loss and loneliness. Written from behind closed doors, Freddie spills his guts to define the innocent archetype.
tagline: W e  a r e  c o n n e c t e d
title: Anarchy (The Visual Album)
